name: MongoDB Sink
shortDescription: Consume data from a Kafka topic in Quix write it to a MongoDB database.

Variables.Name: MONGODB_DOCUMENT_MATCHER
Variables.Description: How documents are selected to update; accepts a JSON-serializable string formatted as a MongoDB filter Query.

Variables.Name: MONGODB_UPSERT
Variables.Description: Boolean to create documents if no matches with MONGODB_DOCUMENT_MATCHER

Variables.Name: MONGODB_UPDATE_METHOD
Variables.Description: How documents found with MONGODB_DOCUMENT_MATCHER are updated

Variables.Name: MONGODB_ADD_MESSAGE_METADATA
Variables.Description: Boolean to include key, timestamp, and headers as '__{field}'

Variables.Name: MONGODB_ADD_TOPIC_METADATA
Variables.Description: Boolean to include topic, partition, and offset as '__{field}'

Variables.Name: CONSUMER_GROUP_NAME
Variables.Description: The name of the consumer group to use when consuming from Kafka

Variables.Name: BUFFER_SIZE
Variables.Description: The number of records that sink waits before flushing data to MongoDB

Variables.Name: BUFFER_TIMEOUT
Variables.Description: The number of seconds that sink waits before flushing data to MongoDB
